title: General Motors, Caterpillar, BGB: Doug Kass' Views
text:
Content preferences Done 
NEW YORK ( Real Money Pro ) -- Doug Kass shares his views every day on RealMoneyPro. Click here for a real-time look at his insights and musings. 

Blackstone/GSO Long Position Gains Affirmation Originally published at 2:00 PM EDT on July 1, 2015 I have previously mentioned why I have purchased and am adding to Blackstone / GSO Strategic Credit : 
Buying Blackstone/GSO Strategic Credit Fund 
JUN 2, 2015 ' 11:20 AM EDT 
I'm buying the Blackstone/GSO Strategic Credit closed-end fund (BGB) with a $16.15 limit in my non-taxable personal retirement account this morning. 
The 12.3% discount to net asset value (the NAV was $18.46 a share as of yesterday's close) is close to the widest it's been over the past year. Average discount to NAV over the last 12 months was just 10.6%, while the current yield is 7.8% and leverage is 32%. 
Thanks to a subscriber in the Comments Section, here is a Seeking Alpha story on BGB. Position: Long BGB
